Just wanted to send a quick message to you all. We passed the #CARES Act, but more is needed. Recurring payments, water shutoff prohibition, and more support for state and local governments. #COVID19 https://t.co/RJGHs7hlnX

We also need to immediately implement a water shutoff prohibition, which 80 members of the House supported in a letter I led with @RepDebDingell and @RepDanKildee to House leadership, especially during a time where hand washing is essential in preventing the spread of COVID-19. https://t.co/Tpy2TNqoku
